mapper.select: SELECT WARNING_ID as WarningId , WARNING_REASON as WarningReason , WARNING_TIME as WarningTime , WARNING_STATUS as WarningStatus , WARNING_FROM_ID as WarningFromId , WARNING_TO_ID as WarningToId , WARNING_RETURN as WarningReturn FROM WARNING WHERE WARNING_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_WARNING = MEMBER_WARNING +1 WHERE MEMBER_ID = (SELECT WARNING_TO_ID FROM WARNING WHERE WARNING_ID = #{warningId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(WARNING_STATUS) FROM WARNING WHERE WARNING_STATUS = 'd1'

SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE ((CHAT_FROM_ID AND CHAT_TO_ID) OR (CHAT_FROM_ID AND CHAT_TO_ID)) AND TO_CHAR(CHAT_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')>=(SELECT TO_CHAR(WARNING_TIME-1/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM WARNING WHERE WARNING_ID = #{warningId}) AND TO_CHAR(CHAT_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')<=(SELECT TO_CHAR(WARNING_TIME+1/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM WARNING WHERE WARNING_ID = #{warningId})
